author: Valerie Strauss
title: Dozens of colleges and universities are dropping SAT/ACT requirements for fall 2021 applicants, and some for longer
description: Some are using it as a pilot to determine whether to eliminate the requirement altogether.
content: Dozens of schools including major universities and such highly selective schools as top-ranked Williams College and other major universities have announced new test-optional policies for current high school juniors as a response to the shutdown of most public… [+8860 chars]
